data.text:
Jimenez, Juan Ramon

Berkeley: University of California Press, 1957. Second edition. Hardcover. Octavo (8vo). Very good+ condition / Very good+ condition (DJ). Item #001606

97 pages of text plus a leaf of index to first lines. Hardcover cloth binding with gilt spine lettering. Dustjacket is price-clipped, lightly rubbed at extremities, with minor sunning at the spine; protected in archival mylar. Includes the uncommon wraparound unique to this second edition, announcing the Nobel Prize for Literature 1956 award. The wraparound is has a small tear with wrinkling at the front panel crease near the fore-edge. A side-by-side translation, with each poem in Spanish and English. Several instances of heavy red pencil underlining throughout text.
